sentences.en: Always buy a heater with thermostat control to save on running costs.
sentences.cn: 始终购买可调温度的取暖器以节省使用成本。

sentences.en: For some people, competing is the be-all and end-all of their running.
sentences.cn: 对于有些人来说，赛跑的全部意义就是竞争。

sentences.en: He also began a running feud with Dean Acheson.
sentences.cn: 他也开始和艾奇逊院长发生接连不断的争执。

sentences.en: he is in the running for an Oscar.
sentences.cn: 他参与竞争奥斯卡奖项。

sentences.en: I hope you told that boss of yours to take a running jump.
sentences.cn: 我希望你叫你那个头儿见鬼去吧。

sentences.en: I lay the painting flat to stop the wet paint running.
sentences.cn: 我把油画平放以防止未干的颜料流动。

sentences.en: Instead of moving at his usual stately pace, he was almost running.
sentences.cn: 他没像平时那样优雅庄重地走着，而是几乎跑了起来。

sentences.en: Jackie was running around with all these brilliant people.
sentences.cn: 杰姬混迹于这些才华横溢的人之间。

sentences.en: She could hear his ragged breathing, as if he had been running.
sentences.cn: 她能听到他不均匀的呼吸声，似乎他是跑着过来的。

sentences.en: Tell her I'll call her back later, I'm running late again.
sentences.cn: 告诉她我过会儿会给她回电话，我又要晚了。

sentences.en: The rate of inflation is running at about 2.7 percent.
There she was, slightly out of breath from running.
sentences.cn: 她在那儿，跑得有点儿喘不过气来。

sentences.en: They fought running battles in the narrow streets with police.
sentences.cn: 他们在狭窄的街道上和警察打起了游击战。

sentences.en: They made it clear who is now running the show.
sentences.cn: 他们清楚地表明了现在是谁在掌控一切。

sentences.en: Timothy was crying, mostly from exhaustion, and his nose was running.
sentences.cn: 由于太累了，蒂莫西哭的一把鼻涕一把泪。

sentences.en: Today's RPI figure shows inflation running at 10.9 per cent.
sentences.cn: 今天的零售物价指数显示通货膨胀率为10.9％。

sentences.en: We beached the canoe, running it right up the bank.
sentences.cn: 我们把独木舟径直划到岸边，并拖上岸。

sentences.en: We chose to do cross-country running.
sentences.cn: 我们选择进行越野赛跑。

sentences.en: You don't have to go running upstairs every time she rings.
sentences.cn: 用不着她一来电话你就往楼上跑。

words.tran_cn: 奔跑；赛跑；趋向；奔跑的路程
跑步者；走私者；推销员；送信人
连续的；流动的；跑着的；运转着的

phrases.tran_cn: 有赢的希望：在竞争中有可能获胜或取得好名次的
正常运转；机组运行正常
无赢的希望：在竞争中没有可能获胜或取得好名次的
惯性运动；跑号；惰转；流出
暗战（电影名称）；快没有时间了
行走系；行走系统；运转系统
见鬼，见鬼去吧（用于表示愤怒地拒绝某人或与某人意见不一）
生龙活虎的；[计]加入与运转；建成投产；在使用中；运行正常的

trans.tran_cn: 跑着的，流动的，连续的，操作中的，运转着的
trans.tran_en: a machine that is in running order is working correctly
Running is the activity of moving fast on foot, especially as a sport
